doc:
Charles Hallahan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Hallahan 0 Charles John Hallahan (July 29, 1943 – November 25, 1997) was an American film, television and stage actor known for his performances in Going in Style, The Thing, Cast a Deadly Spell, and Dante's Peak. he was also best known as Capt. Charlie Devane on Hunter from 1986-91. Charles_John_Hallahan ( July_29_,_1943 – November_25_,_1997 ) was an_American_film_,_television_and_stage_actor known for his_performances in Going in Style , The_Thing , Cast a_Deadly_Spell , and Dante 's_Peak . he was_also_best_known as Capt._Charlie_Devane on Hunter from 1986-91 .
